data.name: 49th Parallel Café & Lucky’s Doughnuts
data.description:
The idea was to keep it simple, and just make doughnuts the old fashioned way, no frozen product, nothing trucked in; just simple, delicious doughnuts and exceptional coffee. As a sub-brand of 49th Parallel Coffee Roasters, Lucky’s Doughnuts has delighted the Vancouver food scene with countless innovative and seasonal doughnut favourites.

Our culinary team is up early, rolling out the dough and prepping each component. Everything is made fresh, from scratch, no exceptions. With the same focus and commitment to quality and sourcing as our coffee program, you can taste the difference in a Lucky’s Doughnut.

data.name: Analog Coffee
data.description: Analog was founded with the view that every cup of coffee poured should be something special, and that ‘good enough’, is never good enough. Every detail of our guest experience is considered and pondered, from the décor, vibe and food, to the coffee itself. Our café, located in the heart of Yaletown, is a place where our community can gather and where we can share our coffee with everyone.

data.name: Artigiano
data.description:
For more than 20 years, Artigiano has taken pride in every single in-house product it creates. Proprietary unique blends produced at its own roaster in Burnaby, B.C., deliver a consistent and perfect cup of coffee – every time.
Artigiano is committed to social responsibility and sustainability by brewing the highest quality coffee in a way that positively impacts our local community, suppliers, team members and those who share it.
All locations are locally owned and operated, with a commitment to local and organic ingredients for all products, whenever possible.

data.name: AVIK
data.description: AVIK, new to Vancouver, we believe in being part of a community based on family, love and goodness. Our first café welcomes you to our coffee, pastry and gelato all designed around quality and value. Multiple International Award winner, Maestro James, named in 2023 as Canada’s best gelato maker, trained in Italy, winner in Italy, brings his expertise and culinary talent along with his world class gelato.

data.name: Bak’d Cookies
data.description: Founded in April 2020, BAK’D Cookies is a brother and sister owned company that makes 5 oz gourmet cookies. BAK’D cookies are not like your typical cookies. They are BIG cookies, made locally, with high quality ingredients. Each cookie is freshly baked and handmade to guarantee that each bite is the perfect bite, every time.

data.name: Bel Café
data.description:
David Hawksworth’s Bel Café combines expertly prepared food and beverages with efficient and friendly service in an inviting, vibrant and chic setting. A selection of ‘ready to go’ items feature fresh-baked pastries, gourmet sandwiches, salads, nourishing soups and delicate desserts.
Specialty coffees are custom-roasted locally and served by a team of highly trained baristas. Artisan teas and local lattes are also available.

data.name: Bella Gelateria
data.description: At Bella Gelateria, preserving the true artisanship of old-world handcrafted gelato is not only our passion but our goal. We do everything just like the way it was once made in Italy, by the best of the best, and have won countless awards and accolades for our unique and delicious gelato flavours. We believe in quality over quantity, so we make everything from scratch, using only the finest ingredients on the market. Our gelatos are made in small batches to ensure they are always fresh and packed full of flavour, leaving our guests with a unique and memorable experience.

data.description: At Boketto Dessert Café, we serve unique desserts that take you to different destinations, blending Asian influences with a creative twist. From our freshly made mini mochi waffles to handcrafted bubble teas and innovative soft-serve sundaes, each treat is crafted to bring joy and spark curiosity. Join us at Boketto, where every bite is a journey and each flavour tells a story.

data.name: BROYÉ CAFÉ & BAKERY
data.description: Broyé Cafe & Bakery brings a unique Japanese-Vietnamese fusion to Vancouver’s coffee scene, specializing in innovative drinks and pastries that blend East Asian flavours with Western favourites. As the first chain in Canada to serve Japanese and Vietnamese coffee together, we pride ourselves on crafting every drink with premium ingredients and authentic techniques, including our beloved moissants—a fusion of croissant and mochi textures. Since opening in 2021, our big family of customers and team members has celebrated these delicious cross-cultural experiences, making every visit a memorable one.

data.name: Butter Baked Goods
data.description: Butter, as it is affectionately known to locals, has been serving up delicious baked goods since 2007. Located between Kerrisdale, Dunbar, and Mackenzie Heights at the corner of 33rd and Mackenzie Street, it’s a great spot to grab breakfast, lunch or one of the many yummy baked goods you remember from your childhood. Everything is made from scratch using only the best and most natural ingredients. The greatest care is taken and no detail overlooked to make sure that everything at Butter tastes as good as Mom would’ve made!

stores.name: Mackenzie

data.name: C Market Coffee
data.description:
At C Market Coffee, our mission is simple: to provide high-quality coffee and food in a fast-paced, casual setting. With 3 locations in Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, and Pitt Meadows, they serve as a hub for growers, artisans, and families – we offer in-house roasted specialty coffee, a daily assortment of freshly baked pastries, beautifully crafted cakes, and delectable Asian-fusion cuisine.
C Market Coffee is an all-inclusive space where top-notch quality, artisan expertise, and exceptional service converge, creating meaningful moments for our guests and team. Whether it’s a leisurely Sunday brunch, afternoon coffee sip, or a quick “grab n go” meal, our diverse menu caters to all, dine-in, or take-out. Experience the charm of C Market Coffee, where our commitment to quality permeates every espresso shot, every sip, and every shared moment to spark a connection!

Here you’ll find us serving fresh made pastries, viennoiserie, cakes and desserts, ranging from classic and traditional flavours to creative and adventurous. Proudly a local small business in the greater Vancouver area, everything served is made in-house from scratch.

data.name: Cannoli King
data.description: At Cannoli King in Port Coquitlam, experience the art of handcrafting exquisite cannoli available in many flavors. Our offerings extend beyond cannoli, encompassing a delectable array of cakes, cookies, pastries, and even corporate gifts. True to our commitment to quality, we meticulously create everything from scratch, from the doughs and fillings to the sponges and custards. Witness the craftsmanship as we cut, handroll, and deep-fry our cannoli shells in-house, ensuring a fresh and delightful experience as we fill them to order right before your eyes.

data.name: Charisma Social Club House
data.description: Charisma Social Club House is a long-standing cafe in Chinatown, seriously serving housemade soups, award-winning cheesecakes, boutique bubble teas, and late-night comfort foods. While we specialize in unique flavour combinations, our extensive menu with customizable features is designed to cater to all preferences and encourage customers to create their own food adventure. Diligently family-run, we’re always open until 1 a.m. daily, and dedicated to providing a cozy, relaxed environment for customers in our spacious restaurant.

data.name: Chez Christophe Chocolaterie Patisserie
data.description:
In 2013, award-winning pastry chef, chocolatier, and Cacao Barry Ambassador Christophe Bonzon opened Chez Christophe Chocolaterie Patisserie with his wife Jess Bonzon in the bustling Burnaby Heights neighbourhood.
Bringing a bit of Swiss flair to Canada, their collection of fine handmade chocolates ranges from artistic chocolate sculptures, creative truffle flavours to signature chocolate bars, and seasonal favourites. Customers can also find an array of macarons, cakes, fine pastry and viennoiserie all of which are hand-made onsite and a full espresso-based coffee bar.
Due to overwhelming support, the pair opened their second location in White Rock, BC in November 2019. The product collection available at the new location remains the same as the Burnaby Flagship location.

data.name: Doughgirls Comfort Kitchen & Bakeshop
data.description:
Inspired by a 1940s theme, the Doughgirls bring fresh, made-from-scratch food, artisan baking, and old time desserts to Wesbrook Village, UBC.
Timeless favourites like Mom’s chocolate cake, Shepherd’s Pie, Cornish Pasties, King Ranch Chicken, and Southern Buttermilk Biscuits will comfort the soul. You can eat in or take it to go. Our grab to go meals are prepared fresh, then frozen, so you can take and bake at your leisure (and create those incredible smells in your own kitchen).
According to Rose and Thuy, the Doughgirls themselves, it’s "Down home done right".

data.name: Eternal Abundance
data.description: Eternal Abundance is an all organic, vegan market & eatery on Commercial Drive. We are a community oriented store that strives to inspire a commitment to sustainable and compassionate living, through supporting organic farming practices and vegan values. We offer a welcoming space that allows customers to explore healthy, conscious consumption through our nourishing eatery menu, as well as our market which stocks a variety of top quality organic produce, superfoods, spices, staple and specialty items. We seek out direct purchasing relationships with local farmers and artisan producers and aim to be as low-waste as possible through efforts like our compostable packaging and jar return program. Come and enjoy healthy plant-based living with us!

Feel like you have been transported to la belle France with a selection of our fresh baked viennoiseries, breads, pastries and macarons.  Enjoy it with our delicious house blend coffee or any choice of our handcrafted drinks.
We also offer a delicious selection of gourmet cakes which will make a show stopping centerpiece for any occasion.

data.name: Fufú Café
data.description:
Fufú Cafe is the spot for the newest stack snack of choice – Japanese Soufflé Pancakes. 
A best-of-both-worlds blend of the classic French dessert and the American breakfast favourite, Japanese Soufflé Pancakes are the newest hot culinary trend, and Fufú is pleased to be the first café in Vancouver to exclusively feature the light and airy delicacies. Known for their incredibly fluffy consistency and wobbly, whimsical appearance, Japanese Souffle Pancakes are a true melt-in-your-mouth treat. As Instagramable as they are delicious.

data.name: Gem Chocolates
data.description: Gem Chocolates is all about handmaking amazing, artisan chocolates using only the highest quality, natural ingredients with absolutely ZERO preservatives or chemical additives.  We are also very keen about creating and providing real career opportunities to people in the neurodivergent community where they can learn and develop new skills and contribute in their unique ways.  We appreciate all the Gems we get to work with: our awesome team members, our wonderful customers, and our amazing suppliers!

data.name: Glenburn Soda Fountain
data.description: A sweet taste of history in The Heights of Burnaby awaits you at Glenburn Soda Fountain. Featuring premium ice cream from Birchwood Dairy, milk and cream from Meadowfresh Dairy, and fruit and berries from local farms, all treats are hand-crafted and made with traditional methods. Milkshakes, malts, classic sundaes, and sodas will bring you back to a time when the soda fountain was the local hot spot.

data.name: Honolulu Coffee
data.description:
In Hawaiian, ohana means “family”, and Honolulu Coffee has been a proud member of Vancouver’s ohana of locally owned bakeries and coffee shops since we brought our signature brand of aloha spirit to the city in 2016.
We are dedicated to bringing an authentic Hawaiian coffee experience and laid back island atmosphere to our many friends and guests at our two cafes in downtown Vancouver and Kerrisdale and are firmly committed to supporting sustainability and the communities that we are proud to call home.
"Farm-to-cup" is the core philosophy around which we have built our brand, and ‘local’ drives everything that we do. We are constantly adjusting our menus and recipes to showcase nearby suppliers and ingredients, and collaborate with our fellow businesses whenever possible to show our support for the local community. To that same end, we also strive to empower our team members at every turn and encourage them to keep developing their skills on both a professional and personal level.
It is an honour to be counted among the many talented cafes and baristas that are taking part in this annual festival, and we look forward to showing off our aloha spirit in every sip!

L’ Atelier is an Artisan French bakery with a southern France inspired cafe , our daily production is hand crafted by our team.

Quality means that everyone can enjoy authentic French pastries and well balanced drinks surrounded by a European atmosphere.

data.name: Tartine Bread & Pies
data.description: Tartine Bread & Pies is a locally operated bakery & cafe located in the heart of Downtown Vancouver. Known for its artisanal approach, the bakery specializes in hand-crafted breads, pies, sandwiches and other baked goods made with high-quality, locally sourced ingredients. The café has become a community favourite, offering both delicious pastries and a cozy, welcoming atmosphere for locals and visitors alike. With a focus on traditional baking techniques, Tartine has built a strong reputation in Vancouver’s thriving food scene.

data.name: To Live For Bakery & Cafe
data.description: To Live For Bakery is an independent, purpose-driven bakery on a mission to prove that the future of baking is plant-based. Flaky croissants, cakes, cookies, loaves, espresso and so much more are available daily at their East Van brick-and-mortar cafe that opened in November of 2022. Established in 2011 as a wholesale bakery, they transitioned away from animal ingredients a few years into their journey after learning what happens to animals in the dairy and egg industries. Through trial and error, they believe the few ingredient swaps they’ve made have led to even more delicious products.

data.name: Union Market
data.description: Union Market is a vibrant community hub nestled in one of Vancouver’s oldest neighbourhoods, thoughtfully reimagined to honour its storied past while embracing fresh, modern ideas. Operated by a passionate team of Strathcona and East Vancouver locals, it provides a welcoming space to savour freshly baked goods, artisan bread, locally sourced essentials, and exceptional coffee. With a deep commitment to fostering community connections and promoting a mindful pace of life, Union Market remains a cherished cornerstone of the neighbourhood.

data.description: There is a place where Old World Artistry meets Urban Social — a place where old school tradition embraces contemporary culinary genius. Uno Gelato is a place where playful, unexpected epicurean adventures are consummated every day. Uno Gelato is a luxurious playground for the senses where all you need to bring (other than a BFF) is an unquenchable obsession to explore, celebrate…and return

data.name: Uprising Breads Bakery
data.description:
Uprising Breads Bakery Café is a familiar destination and a favourite meeting spot in the vibrant Commercial Drive neighbourhood of East Vancouver. We bake everything on site, early every morning. We offer that full selection of familiar home baking that will make you want, "one of everything please!"
Our bright and cheerful, comfy-cozy café provides indoor and outdoor seating with a full coffee service. Lunchtime offerings include homemade soups and salads, hot savoury items and a variety of sandwiches, made on our own fresh baked breads.
Like the locals say: "Meet you at the Uprising!"

data.name: Vancouver Aquarium
data.description: Since opening in 1956, the Vancouver Aquarium has connected more than 40 million people from around the world to our oceans and inspired them to take action to address key threats. Located in Stanley Park, the Vancouver Aquarium is home to hundreds of incredible species. The Vancouver Aquarium is a fully accredited member of Association of Zoos and Aquariums (AZA), Alliance of Marine Mammal Parks and Aquariums (AMMPA), Canada’s Accredited Zoos and Aquariums (CAZA), and Humane Conservation Certified by American Humane.
